# transitionStyle

**Instance Property**

The transition style the page controller uses when changing pages.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var transitionStyle: NSPageController.TransitionStyle { get set }
```

## Discussion

The possible values for the transition style are discussed in [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPageController/TransitionStyle-swift.enum].

The default value is [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPageController/TransitionStyle-swift.enum/stackHistory].
title: transitionStyle
